categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Card Captor, also known as "The Captain," was the codename for the male Sullustan who ran the Rebel Alliance cell on Cloud City since a year before the Battle of Hoth.
Shortly before the Battle of Endor, he provided the nav-coordinates to the Rebel safe world Kaliska to agents tasked with rescuing several relatives of Alliance personnel.
